text: The Kia KX7 is a Mid-size Crossover SUV made by Kia from 2017 to 2021. == History and Features == The Kia KX7 made its debut on the Guangzhou Auto Show in 2016. and was put on sale in China in March 2017. the SUV is produced by the Dongfeng-Yueda-Kia joint venture and is based on the 3rd gen Kia Sorento which is imported in China and was positioned as a more affordable option to the KX7. The Kia KX7 has 2.0 2.0 turbocharged and 2.4 liter petrol engines that are the same engines from the Sorento but adapted the KX7 has 6-speed manual and automatic transmissions. == Markets == The Kia KX7 was sold only in the Chinese market. == Discontinuation == The production of the Kia KX7 ended in 2021 and the SUV was discontinued without a sucessor. == References == KX7 Category:2010s automobiles Category:2020s automobiles Category:Sport utility vehicles
title: Kia KX7
